root.message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 8-10-1, translated into en
root.data:
The indicators in the FAS database are collected on an annual basis since 2009, covering the period since 2004. Information is collected from central banks or other main financial regulators for 189 jurisdictions.

All data and metadata are available free of charge to the public on the IMF’s FAS website, along with other key documents.
